[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/grid-tabulator](./grid-tabulator.md) &gt; [GridTabulator](./grid-tabulator.gridtabulator.md) &gt; [showHeaderFilters](./grid-tabulator.gridtabulator.showheaderfilters.md)

## GridTabulator.showHeaderFilters property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

If true, will show header filters on columns by default

**Signature:**

```typescript
showHeaderFilters: boolean;
```

## Remarks

Defaults to false
